item.title: LeBron James Calls Kevin Durant a ‘Killer’ and Shows Disapproval Towards Kyrie Irving
item.description: LeBron James Calls Kevin Durant a ‘Killer’ and Shows Disapproval Towards Kyrie Irving LeBron James’ Twitter is a source of information.

item.title: Is Stephen Curry Playing Tonight Vs Heat? Warriors Release Availability Report for 2x NBA MVP
item.description: Is Stephen Curry Playing Tonight Vs Heat? Warriors Release Availability Report for 2x NBA MVP Stephen Curry and the Warriors are not having the start to the season that they would’ve been expecting.

item.title: Why is Paul George Not Playing Vs Thunder? Clippers Star Subject of Saddening News Amidst Good Streak of Games
item.description: Why is Paul George Not Playing Vs Thunder? Clippers Star Subject of Saddening News Amidst Good Streak of Games Why has Paul George been sat out by Tyronn Lue against the OKC Thunder?

item.title: “Buy Those Cops Some New Cars”: When Shaquille O’Neal Got Ford to Donate Cars to Police Department During 1992 LA Riots
item.description: “Buy Those Cops Some New Cars”: When Shaquille O’Neal Got Ford to Donate Cars to Police Department During 1992 LA Riots Shaquille O’Neal is a living legend worth some $400 million bucks.

item.title: “He Did but he was Just There as Father Figure”: Kobe Bryant Reveals Father Joe Bryant’s Contribution to NBA Career
item.description: “He Did but he was Just There as Father Figure”: Kobe Bryant Reveals Father Joe Bryant’s Contribution to NBA Career Kobe Bryant is a prodigious talent and his accolades are directly accredited to his upbringing, with Joe Bryant, his dad, an integral figure!

item.title: Is Paolo Banchero Playing Tonight vs Knicks? Orlando Magic Release Injury Report on Rookie
item.description: Is Paolo Banchero Playing Tonight vs Knicks? Orlando Magic Release Injury Report on Rookie Paolo Banchero is the name on everyone’s mind.
